hymn.title: Hebrews 1:3
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - G - | Am - C/E - | F - G - | C - G - | C - G - | Am - C/E - | F - Dm7 - | Gsus4 - G - | C - Em - | F - C - | Am - C/E - | F - G - | C - Am - | F - Dm7 - | G - G7 - | C - - - ||

layout.singingstanza: Who, be -- ing the ef -- ful -- gence of His glo -- ry and the im -- press of His sub -- stance and up -- hold -- ing and bear -- ing all things by the word of His power, hav -- ing made pu -- ri -- fi -- ca -- tion of sins, sat down on the right hand, the right hand of the Ma -- jes -- ty on high.

lyrics.stanza: Who, being the effulgence of His glory And the impress of His substance And upholding and bearing all things By the word of His power, Having made purification of sins, Sat down on the right hand, the right hand of The Majesty on high.
